'''Human Rights Watch''' is a international [[NGO]] based in [[New York City]] working with human rights issues.
The organization was started under the name Helsinki Watch in [[1978]] to monitor the [[Soviet Union]]'s compliance to the [[Helsinki Accords]]. Other watch organizations was started to cover other parts of the world. They were united in [[1988]] and formed Human Rights Watch.
Human Rights Watch was one of six international NGOs who founded the [[Coalition to Stop the Use of Child Soldiers]] in [[1998]].
